name: LudumBuster
description:
Keep the VHS rental service alive!

Make the clients stay inside your store until they decide to rent a VHS!
Use any means necessary. throw them around a bit if you have to. Else, you'll have to answer to the Big Cheese.

BUG WARNING: Don't grab clients falling from the sky without a green gauge bar above their head or crash!

Controls:
AD to move
W to jump
SPACE to grab, SPACE again to throw into air
S to put town
E to interact with object and F to buy
